content: ISSUE FOUND: Config structure mismatch - unified_mcp_server.py expects config.gpu.director_config.hip_visible_devices but simplified config doesn't have this
COMPLETE: All services accessible - Ollama✅, Redis✅, Neo4j✅, Qdrant✅, PostgreSQL✅
ISSUE FOUND: Simple LLM calls work, but agent imports fail due to config mismatch
IDENTIFIED: Config object structure mismatch affects all components
MINOR ISSUE: Pydantic v1 style validators deprecated, otherwise models work
COMPLETE: Ollama working with 7 models including deepseek-r1
